text: Ceroplesis massaica is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Per Olof Christopher Aurivillius in 1908. It is known from Tanzania and Kenya.BioLib.cz - Ceroplesis massaica. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. It contains the variety Ceroplesis massaica var. rufofasciata. ==References== Category:Ceroplesis Category:Beetles described in 1908
title: Ceroplesis massaica
